channel.title: Restart services after upgrading - documentation update
channel.description:
[html]

Whonix’s documentation on updating the operating system ( https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Security_Guide#Updates ) has been updated. There is now a new chapter “restart services after upgrading” that you should be aware of: https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Security_Guide#Restart_Services_after_Upgrading

[/html]

item.title: Restart services after upgrading - documentation update
item.dc:creator: townsend
item.description:
Thank you very much for the Documentation UPDATE!

Best Regards!

townsend

Read full topic
item.source: Restart services after upgrading - documentation update
